title: Implementing trait for Existential type ICE's

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-impl-trait
labels.description: Area: impl Trait. Universally / existentially quantified anonymous types with static dispatch.

body:
Trying to implement a trait for an existential type, ICE's:

```Rust

#![feature(existential_type)]

existential type Bar: PartialEq;

fn bazr() -> Bar { }

impl Eq for Bar {}

fn main() {}
```

<details>
<summary>Backtrace:</summary>
 
```
 Compiling playground v0.0.1 (file:///playground)
error: internal compiler error: librustc/traits/coherence.rs:487: ty_is_local invoked on unexpected type: Bar

thread 'main' panicked at 'Box<Any>', librustc_errors/lib.rs:579:9
stack backtrace:
   0: std::sys::unix::backtrace::tracing::imp::unwind_backtrace
```
